pluginstrument.type: Garmin G3000 / 5000 PFD MFD Bezel Overlay
pluginstrument.author: Yves Levesque - modified by Joe "Cruchmeister" Gilker
pluginstrument.description:
Bezel overlay for G3000 and G5000 screens. Can be used as a G3000 or a buttonless G5000 unit.
Which unit type can be selected by the user property in the instrument configuration.
